named-native-query.name: ApplEntity.addr.phone
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT t4.APPL_NO , t4.VERSION , t4.STORE_CD FROM fbappladdr s0 , fbappladdr t2 , fbapplphone s3 , fbapplphone t4 WHERE s0.APPL_NO = :APPL_NO AND s0.VERSION = :VERSION AND s0.STORE_CD = :STORE_CD AND t2.addr_pnu_cd = s0.addr_pnu_cd AND t2.strt_addr_2 = s0.strt_addr_2 AND t2.ORG_ID <> s0.ORG_ID AND s3.APPL_NO = s0.APPL_NO AND s3.VERSION = s0.VERSION AND s3.STORE_CD = s0.STORE_CD AND s3.ORG_ID = s0.ORG_ID AND s3.wire_mobile_gb = '1' AND t4.APPL_NO = t2.APPL_NO AND t4.VERSION = t2.VERSION AND t4.STORE_CD = t2.STORE_CD AND t4.full_phone_no = s3.full_phone_no AND t4.ORG_ID <> s3.ORG_ID

named-native-query.name: ApplEntity2.mphone.wphone
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT t6.APPL_NO , t6.VERSION , t6.STORE_CD FROM fbapplphone s0 , fbapplphone t2 , fbapplphone s3 , fbapplphone t6 WHERE s0.APPL_NO = :APPL_NO AND s0.VERSION = :VERSION AND s0.STORE_CD = :STORE_CD AND s0.wire_mobile_gb = '3' AND t2.full_phone_no = s0.full_phone_no AND t2.ORG_ID <> s0.ORG_ID AND s3.APPL_NO = s0.APPL_NO AND s3.VERSION = s0.VERSION AND s3.STORE_CD = s0.STORE_CD AND s3.ORG_ID = s0.ORG_ID AND s3.wire_mobile_gb = '1' AND t6.APPL_NO = t2.APPL_NO AND t6.VERSION = t2.VERSION AND t6.STORE_CD = t2.STORE_CD AND t6.ORG_ID = t2.ORG_ID AND t6.full_phone_no = s3.full_phone_no AND t6.ORG_ID <> s3.ORG_ID

named-native-query.name: ApplEntity3.fraud
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.APPL_NO , t3.VERSION , t3.STORE_CD FROM fbapplphone s0 , fbapplphone t2 , fbapplmst t3 WHERE s0.APPL_NO = :APPL_NO AND s0.VERSION = :VERSION AND s0.STORE_CD = :STORE_CD AND s0.wire_mobile_gb = '1' AND t2.nice_fraud_stat_cd = '7' AND t2.full_phone_no = s0.full_phone_no AND t3.APPL_NO = t2.APPL_NO AND t3.VERSION = t2.VERSION AND t3.STORE_CD = t2.STORE_CD AND t3.FRAUD_RSN_CD1 not in ( '10', '11', '12', '13' )
